src.main.groovy.io.github.javaconductor.gserv
[Groovy] Class GServResource

java.lang.Object
  src.main.groovy.io.github.javaconductor.gserv.GServResource

class GServResource

An HTTP/REST resource definition. These resources may be added to a ServerInstance which, when deployed, will publish all imported resources.
